thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 09 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Fox Says Expect To Receive UK Regulatory Approval On Sky Deal In A Month Or Two

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Fox Says Expect To Receive UK Regulatory Approval On Sky Deal In A Month Or Two

organizations.name: brief-fox says expect to receive uk regulatory approval on sky

text:
May 9 (Reuters) - Walt Disney Co:
* FOX - EXPECTS TO BE IN THE POSITION TO REQUEST SHAREHOLDER APPROVAL FOR DISNEY TRANSACTION AND CREATION OF NEW FOX THIS SUMMER-LACHLAN MURDOCH
* FOX - THE FOX NEWS CHANNEL ACHIEVED ITS HIGHEST QUARTERLY EBITDA IN ITS HISTORY - LACHLAN MURDOCH, CONF CALL
* FOX - ADJUSTED EPS OF $0.49 INCLUDES A $0.02 PER SHARE CHARGE RELATED TO STOCK COMPENSATION CHARGE-CFO, CONF CALL
* FOX - GIVEN COMCAST BID FOR SKY WE ARE CONSIDERING OUR OPTIONS, WITH ANNOUNCEMENT IN “DUE COURSE”-JAMES MURDOCH, CONF CALL
* FOX - EXPECT TO RECEIVE U.K. REGULATORY APPROVAL ON SKY TRANSACTION IN A MONTH OR TWO -JAMES MURDOCH, CONF CALL Further company coverage:
